1.[Yāsirum Yuhanʿim and his on Shammar Yuharʿish, the two kings of Sabaʾ and Dhū-Raydān … …] and constructed and bui[lt ... ... the w]al[l and the glacis and the towers of their town] 2.[of Hakirum, and they built it and constructed and completed the construction … …] a construction in mud-brick and [in stone ... ...]. And they increased [and built high its wall and its glacis] 3.[and its towers with two roofs and with a roof in … ...] its wall and its glacis and its towers from its upper [part to its foundation. And they constructed it and added] 4.[a new wall, and they ??? and they equipped it ??? ... ...] they repaired and reinforced for its gate door-leaves and a construction [and a completion with all accuracy, from the foundation to the] 5.[the top—(this) in the space of ten days from the month of Dhū-Mubakkirān (i.e. May) ... ...] by the power of their lord, ʿAthtar [Shāri]qān [and their protective goddesses and their (other) gods, and by the resources and the authority of the armies] 6.[of Raydān. And they committed their town of Hakirum … … …] in the month of Dhū-Qiyāẓān (i.e. June) [of the] ye[ar 396 of the Era of Mabḥaḍ bin ʾAbḥuḍ].
